raw_body: FERNANDO – OLIVER ANNESLY – (Former Accountant,​ State Distilleries Corporation /​ Internal Auditor,​ King Faisal Specialist Hospital,​ Saudi Arabia),​ passed away. Beloved husband of Kanthi,​ loving father of Angella Kalashini,​ father-in-law of Luqman,​ much loved grandfather of Joy & Joshua (Australia),​ loving son of late Nelson and Irene Fernando (Mattakkuliya),​ brother of Oreen,​ late Jeniview and Onereen,​ brother-in-law of Irvine Balasooriya and late Chullakantha Balasuriya. Remains will lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour,​ Mount Lavinia from Friday,​ the 15th from 10.30 a.m. until 8.00 p.m. Saturday from 10.00 a.m. onwards. Funeral Service will be on Saturday,​ 16th September at The Parlour at 3.00 p.m. and cortege will leave for burial at 3.30 p.m. for Mount Lavinia Cemetery.058126
